column3: $Glen Hobbie called for interference for running into his own batted ball

ej,jonew101,P,conlj102,Balls and strikes ej,oterr101,C,conlj102,Balls and strikes $Jones and Reds Coach Otero ejected by HP umpire Conlan for arguing strike call on 2-1 pitch; Osteen completed strikeout which was charged to Jones
ej,larkn101,P,secof101,Call at 1B $the ball caromed off Glen Hobbie; Norm Larker ejected by 1B umpire Frank Secory
$Mike McCormick struck on the face by the ball; left with a split lower lip
$umpire Jocko Conlan missed the game with a cold
$Jose Pagan missed a bunt for strike three; Sammy Taylor completed unassisted double play with tag
Debut game for Jimmie Schaffer
$Jose Pagan called for interference for running into his own batted ball
$Dick Bertell thought Orlando Cepeda had fanned on a 1-2 pitch; Bertell rolled the ball back to the mound
$a fan in the LF bleachers batted Ed Bressoud's ball back onto the playing field for a double and interference
$Jerry Kindall injured his back trying to make a play on Henry Aaron
18 minute rain delay
$Larry Sherry's line drive caromed off Ernie Banks to Andre Rodgers
ej,asprb101,P,smitv101,Call at 2B (Threw helmet) Bob Aspromonte ejected by 2B umpire Vinnie Smith for throwing helmet while arguing the call at 2B
Debut game for Johnny Edwards
$Wally Post's drive knocked back onto the field by a fan for interference
$Billy Williams doubled off the top of the RF screen and thought it was a homerun; he was tagged out halfway between 2B and 3B
Debut game for Jerry Buchek
$First major league game with an umpire in centerfield; experiment by crew chief Al Barlick because that umpire could make calls along the wall in both directions
$the ball landed in the upper section of the CF bleachers 525 to 550 feet from HP
$Ed Bouchee called for interference when he ran into Bill Mazeroski
$Ruben Amaro fouled a pitch off himself
ej,johnd106,P,dascf901,Call at HP ej,maucg101,M,dascf901,Call at HP Darrell Johnson and Phillies Manager Gene Mauch ejected by HP umpire Frank Dascoli
$Robin Roberts hurt his knee trying to field ball
$Game called due to darkness
$George Altman's line drive caromed off of Bill White's glove into the Cardinal dugout
$Billy Williams beaned
$game called due to darkness; tie game to be replayed in its entirety on 9/3
Debut game for Al Kenders
Glen Hobbie left with a sore back
$Ron Santo struck on the neck by the ball
$Andre Rodgers struck out but 3B umpire Ed Sudol had called time to remove a ball from Maury Wills' pocket
ej,durol101,C,donaa901,Argument over too many players on mound Dodgers Coach Leo Durocher ejected by HP umpire Augie Donatelli
Debut game for Cuno Barragan
$Don Elston thought he had struck out Ernie Bowman
ej,elstd101,P,burkk101,Balls and strikes Don Elston ejected by HP umpire Ken Burkhart
$Game called due to darkness
$Bob Skinner's liner hit Don Cardwell on the foot
Debut game for Moe Morhardt
$Moe Morhardt fumbled Ernie Banks' throw
$Al McBean struck on the foot by the line drive
Debut game for Lou Brock
Debut game for Ken Hubbs
ej,barrc101,P,lands901,Call at 3B Cuno Barragan ejected by HP umpire Stan Landes sometime in eighth
$Ernie Banks left with a stiff neck
Game stopped by rain
